infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app uses the camera to scan barcodes.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: We need access to the microphone to use siri.
infoPlist.NSPrivacyAccessedAPICategoryDiskSpace: This app checks your device's storage space to see how much free space is available.
infoPlist.NSPrivacyAccessedAPICategoryFileTimestam: This app may access timestamps of files on your device.
infoPlist.NSPrivacyAccessedAPICategorySystemBootTi: This app may access the time your device last booted up to measure internal performance or enable accurate timers. No personal information is collected.
infoPlist.NSPrivacyAccessedAPICategoryUserDefaults: This app stores information on your device to remember your preferences and settings
